definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder

sentences.english: Hope, whose spur fanned your ardor into flame.
sentences.chinese: 希望，曾用马刺煽旺你的热情。

sentences.english: San Antonio Spurs When healthy, the Spurs are as good as anybody.
sentences.chinese: 只要保持健康，马刺还是一等一强队。

sentences.english: The Spurs might have found another steal in the draft.
sentences.chinese: 马刺很有可能又一次在选修环节中捡了一个大便宜。

sentences.english: Finley's relative decrepitude bodes ill for the Spurs.
sentences.chinese: 芬利相对就预示着逐渐衰老的马刺。
请你们不要大呼小叫了，马刺的球迷们。

sentences.english: The cavalry spurred their horses on.
sentences.chinese: 骑兵们用踢马刺驱马前进。

sentences.english: Oh yeah, that first game, that Spurs' 20-point blown lead, remember that?
sentences.chinese: 是的，第一场，马刺一度领先20分，记得吗？

sentences.english: Features large non-staining nylon spurs for fast cleaning while spinning on the buffer.
sentences.chinese: 配备有大非染色尼龙马刺快速清洗而在缓冲旋转。

sentences.english: But they were not as good as the Spurs'second-half triple-threat.
sentences.chinese: 但是他们都不如马刺在下半场三方的攻击。

sentences.english: All those things have to get better in the post-season, particularly against the Jazz or Spurs.
sentences.chinese: 季后赛火箭方方面面都要提升，尤其是打爵士或马刺。

sentences.english: The only salt was in the Spurs' wounds the last time the Lakers were there with Fisher.
sentences.chinese: 马刺最后一次被湖人所伤是费舍尔还在的时候。

sentences.english: The Spurs don't know what to expect this season out of Ian Mahinmi.
sentences.chinese: 马刺不知道这个赛季会给与马辛米怎样的斯待。

sentences.english: The last time the Spurs have been nothing back, was forced to surrender.
sentences.chinese: 马刺最后时刻的反扑也告无功而返，被迫缴械投降。

sentences.english: I spurred his horse and run away.
sentences.chinese: 我用踢马刺策马，跑开了。

sentences.english: Bryant's hasty turnaround 16-footer was short, and the Spurs gained possession.
sentences.chinese: 布莱恩特草率的多步转向投篮没中，马刺获得球权。

sentences.english: The Spurs never had an easy look at the basket.
sentences.chinese: 今天马刺在篮圈面前没有讨到好脸色。

definition: horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
